short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Project Alf that allows to analyze page or selected text and allow to create task, product or objective from it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform text into Actionable Insights with Project Alf!

Boost your productivity with an AI-powered Chrome extension that analyzes web page content or selected text. Whether you're reading an article, reviewing a report, or brainstorming ideas, this tool turns words into actionable outputs:

Product Ideas
Generate innovative product concepts based on key information.

Task Suggestions
Identify specific actions to take from the content.

Objectives
Create clear and structured objectives tailored to your project needs.

Seamlessly integrate AI into your daily workflow to save time, improve efficiency, and unlock new possibilities from every word you read.

How It Works:

Gmail Page Mode
Analyze entire email content directly on Gmail.

Selection Mode
Select text on any webpage to get instant AI-driven suggestions.
